name: Washington, DC
description: A visit to DC is incomplete without a visit to the capitol building, white house and a few of the country's best museums like the Holocaust Museum, Spy Museum and Newseum.

name: Philadelphia, PA
description: With something for everyone, Philly is a great Chol Hamoed Option. Kids will love the Franklin Institute and Philly Ducks tour. Make sure to visit Liberty Bell, Independence Hall and the mint to learn about...

name: Vail, CO
description: Be blown away by the breathtaking views of the Rocky Mountains, visit Garden of the Gods and have some fun skiing in the winter or alpine sledding and mountain coastering in the summer.
